Portugal in the Eurovision Song Contest: Manuela Bravo performed the song "Sobe, sobe, balão sobe" and achieved 1st place with 149 points. She was the 9th act to perform.
Concha performed the song "Qualquer dia, quem diria" and achieved 6th place with 78 points. She was the 3rd act to perform.
Florência performed the song "O combóio do Tua" and achieved 8th place with 63 points. She was the 7th act to perform.
